captions.text: Order Mad As Hell on iTunes Available Now

Ladies and Gentleman we got em down goes Jon
Stewart Down Goes Jon Stewart he's leaving

the Daily Show obviously could not compete
with the Young Turks his final statement was

TYT Too Strong alright I'm playing we love
John Stewart he had an amazing run at the

Daily Show fifteen years he worked super hard
there in 2009 he won trusted news source in

a poll isn't that amazing he had these amazing
interviews where he actually challenged the

politians more than regular people in news
the news anchors who are of course news actors

including president Obama he asked him some
of the toughest questions and get a load of

the accolades here At its peak The Daily Show
boasted over three million nightly viewers

it has won 19 Emmy Awards two Peabody Awards
and inspired three popular spin-offs The Colbert

Report Last Week Tonight and The Nightly Show
get a load of the list of people who graduated

from under Jon Stewart Steve Carrel Steve
Colbert Ed Helms John Oliver Michael Che Larry

Wilmore Samantha Bee Rob Riggle Rob Corddry
Wyatt Cenac Aasif Mandvi and the list goes

on and on what amazing career he had the career
isn't over but his run on the Daily Show apparently

is and he has most certainly earned the right
to drop the mic Jon Stewart brilliant job

at The Daily Show you will most certainly
be missed

title: Cenk Uygur's Final Judgment: Jon Stewart Leaving The Daily Show
